Subject: Rotate Password
Description: Stealthaudit runs under a service account. I need to rotate the password per policy. I know where to change it in the Stealthaudit consol, is there anywhere else?
Solution_Comment__c:
[Issue]
Customer needed help with where to enter the new password for this service account during their password rotation

[Resolution]
There are a few spots in relation to StealthAUDIT that the service account password may need changed:

Within the StealthAUDIT Application:

Settings > Connection Profiles
Settings > Schedule
Settings > ServiceNow
Other places in the environment:

System Services - the StealthAUDIT (or Netwrix) Web Server service
Stealthbits Activity Monitor
Agent tab > each agent
Monitor Hosts tab > Edit the monitored host for anything other than Windows hosts
StealthAUDIT Access Information Center v11.5
IIS > Application Pool
Netwrix Access Information Center v11.6
System Services - Netwrix Access Information Center service
